content: I cannot predict the future or have opinions. however, avengers: endgame, which was released in 2019, broke numerous box office records and became the highest-grossing movie of all time before avatar reclaimed the title with its chinese re-release in 2021. it's certainly possible that the next avengers movie or another highly-anticipated movie could break avatar's record in the future, but only time will tell. until then, fans of the mcu can sit back and enjoy the upcoming movies and tv shows that are part of the franchise.
